title: St. Clements orange and lemon drizzle cake
description: My dad was always very proud of his London roots and so as a tribute to him, I’ve made this cake in homage to the famous bells of St. Clements.For this recipe you will need 2 x 23cm/9in springform cake tins and an electric mixer.
ingredients: 450g/1lb unsalted butter, allow extra for greasing (at room temperature)
4 large oranges, zest and 300ml/10fl oz juice only
6 lemons, juice only (reserve the peel of 1 lemon)
200g/7oz caster sugar, plus extra for sprinkling
